DataElement.preferredDefinition: Time of ECG represented in an unambiguous time format (e.g., hh:mm:ss).

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Elevated to Standard per governance approval by RA. 2021-6-9 ak. 12/18/18 TT released/MC.  11-19-18 TT added max length.  Created as part of CDISC mapping task. 6.22.18 mc

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the time the ECG was
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the time the ECG was collected?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the time the ECG was done (as complete as possible).

ReferenceDocuments.name: EGDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable EGDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: May be required when multiple assessments are done on one day or when the timing in relationship to study treatment is required for analysis.
